title: The Cyber Punk: Ready-2-Play?
description: Are you ready to play?Pick any character to start.Five characters offer five different perspectives in a cyberpunk world.Can the Rebel escape?Will the Human overcome their struggle with reality?Will society accept the A.I.?Can the Rain weather the storm?Does the Splice survive?Dive in, and decipher the symbolism.You decide the heroes from the villains.Warning, this is not an actual game.Life is real.*VR headset not required nor included with purchase.Author's The poems set as an image include Alt Text.
author: Davene Le Grange
